name: Resident Evil Re:Verse Beta
description:
This open beta test is available to all! Beloved Resident Evil characters clash in a fight to the death! Test your skills against other players in six-person deathmatch battles.

But don't forget the terrifying bioweapons! You'll need to master the skills of the heroes and bioweapons alike if you want to claw your way to victory!

Availability period:
4/7 23:00 - 4/10 22:59 (PDT)

Note: Capcom ID registration required. Availability period subject to change without notice. Please check the official website for further details.
